title: on me by section 17 of the Immigration Act 2004 (No. 1 of 2004) (as adapted by
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) 

(Amendment) (No. 2) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation at 11.00 p.m. on 31 December 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited immigration act 2004 (visas) (amendment) (no 2) order 2020 (2) order come operation 11.00 p.m 31 december 2020

title: on me by section 17 of the Immigration Act 2004 (No. 1 of 2004) (as adapted by
heading: 2. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is
text_raw:
2. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is 

amended - 

(a) 

in Article 2 - 

(i) 

by the deletion of the definition of “Regulations of 2006”, 

(ii) by the insertion of the following definitions: 

“ ‘Regulations of 2015’ means the European Communities 
(Free Movement of Persons) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 
548 of 2015); 

‘Regulations of 2020’ means 
the European Union 
(Withdrawal Agreement) (Citizens’ Rights) Regulations 
2020; 

‘United Kingdom national’ has the meaning assigned to it 
by the Regulations of 2020;”, 

(iii) by the substitution of the following definition for the 

definition of “family members”: 

“ ‘family members’ - 

(a) 

(b) 

in Article 3(ca) has the meaning assigned to it 
by the Regulations of 2020, and 

in any other case, has the meaning assigned to 
it by the Regulations of 2015;”, and 

(iv) by 

the substitution of “Regulations of 2015” for 
“Regulations of 2006” in the definitions of “permanent 
residence card” and “residence card”, 

and 

(b) 

in Article 3, by the insertion of the following paragraph after 
paragraph (c): 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [729] 3 

“(ca) non-nationals who are family members of a United 
Kingdom national and holders of a residence document 
issued in accordance with Article 18(4) of the Agreement 
on the Withdrawal of the United Kingdom of Great Britain 
and Northern Ireland from the European Union and the 
European Atomic Energy Community1, approved on behalf 
of the European Union by Council Decision (EU) 2020/135 
of 30 January 20202;”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 December, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

1 OJ No. CI 384, 12.11.2019, p.1 
2 OJ No. L 29, 31.1.2020, p.1 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [729]
text_norm: 2 immigration act 2004 (visas) order 2014 (s.i no 473 2014) amended - (a) article 2 - (i) deletion definition regulation 2006 (ii) insertion following definition regulation 2015 mean european community (free movement persons) regulation 2015 (s.i no 548 2015) regulation 2020 mean european union (withdrawal agreement) (citizens rights) regulation 2020 united kingdom national meaning assigned regulation 2020 (iii) substitution following definition definition family member family member - (a) (b) article 3(ca) meaning assigned regulation 2020 case meaning assigned regulation 2015 (iv) substitution regulation 2015 regulation 2006 definition permanent residence card residence card (b) article 3 insertion following paragraph paragraph (c) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 8th january 2021 729 3 (ca) non-nationals family member united kingdom national holder residence document issued accordance article 18(4) agreement withdrawal united kingdom great britain northern ireland european union european atomic energy community1 approved behalf european union council decision (eu) 2020 135 30 january 20202  given official seal 31 december 2020 helen mcentee minister justice 1 oj no ci 384 12.11.2019 p.1 2 oj no l 29 31.1.2020 p.1 4 729

text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends Articles 2 and 3 of the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order
